001package org.biopax.paxtools.impl.level3;
002
003import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.RnaReference;
004import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.EntityReference;
005import org.biopax.paxtools.model.level3.Rna;
006import org.biopax.paxtools.util.IllegalBioPAXArgumentException;
007
008
009public class RnaImpl extends NucleicAcidImpl  implements Rna
010{
011
012        public RnaImpl() {
013        }
014
015        @Override
016        public void setEntityReference(EntityReference entityReference) {
017                if(entityReference instanceof RnaReference || entityReference == null)
018                        super.setEntityReference(entityReference);
019                else
020                        throw new IllegalBioPAXArgumentException("setEntityReference failed: "
021                                        + entityReference.getUri() + " is not a RnaReference.");
022        }
023
024// --------------------- Interface BioPAXElement ---------------------
025
026    public Class<? extends Rna> getModelInterface()
027        {
028                return Rna.class;
029        }
030}
